titleStmt.title: Scripture authentick and faith certain a discourse which may serve for an answer to divers late aspersions on the integrity of originals and validity of our modern translations / by Edward Lord Bishop of Cork and Rosse.
titleStmt.author: Wettenhall, Edward, 1636-1713.
